name: Cobblestone Generator
pages: The Cobblestone Generator can be used to generate stone, blackstone, cobbled deepslate, cobblestone, deepslate, or obsidian. This is done by placing a bucket of lava and water inside. This generator can also use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$. Additionally this generator requires a $(l:patchouli:items/fuel_power_verifier)fuel power verfier/$ in it.
